## 7.2
# 1) fireplaces, bedrooms, living_area, bathroom
# 2) For houses with living area less than 1080 sq ft, number of bathrooms doesn't affect price
# 3) For houses with living are 1080-1483 sq ft, the typical price difference between houses with 1.5 bathrooms and 2 bathrooms is $28372.15
# 4) Having a fireplace is associated with a higher price. A confounding variable is the living area - having a fireplace is associated with a larger living area.
